headline: EVERBAY CAPITAL RELEASES FOLLOW-UP LETTER TO GOLDEN ENTERTAINMENT'S BOARD OF DIRECTORS, EXPRESSING SIGNIFICANT CONCERNS ABOUT THE ANNOUNCED TRANSACTIONS
summary: Today, Everbay Capital LP ("Everbay"), a New York-based alternative investment management firm, which manages funds which have been shareholders of Golden Entertainment Inc. (NASDAQ: GDEN), a Minnesota corporation (the "Company"), since 2021, released a new letter to the Company's Board of Directors, following up on the letter it sent last week. headline: Gaming and Leisure Properties: This Forgotten Casino REIT Has A Near 7% Jackpot Yield
summary: Gaming and Leisure Properties' leverage remains manageable at 4.4x, with no debt maturing until 2027. Read why I maintain a Buy rating for GLPI stock.
